{"id":951024295,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1684181905,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/951024295/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Losers of the Circular Game","memory":"8.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> circularGameLosers(int n, int k) {\n        vector<int>vis(n,0);\n        int i=0,j=1;\n        while(1)\n        {\n            if(vis[i]==1)\n                break;\n            vis[i]=1;\n            i=(i+j*k)%n;\n            j++;\n        }\n        vector<int>ans;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)\n        {\n            if(vis[i]==0)\n                ans.push_back(i+1);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-losers-of-the-circular-game","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
